home.heroSubtitle: From the producer to your table
home.heroDescription: The first Algerian platform connecting local farmers directly with consumers. Fresh products, fair prices, fast delivery.
home.aboutText: DZ-Fellah connects Algerian consumers directly with local farmers. Our mission is to make access to fresh, authentic, seasonal products easier, while supporting producers.
home.aboutFeature3: Secure platform for buying and selling
home.whySubtitle: A platform designed to connect producers and consumers
home.feature1Desc: Buy directly from local farmers without middlemen
home.feature3Desc: Reduce your footprint and support local
home.feature4Desc: Fair prices for producers and consumers
home.categoriesSubtitle: Discover the diversity of Algerian farm products available on our platform
home.cat1Desc: Apples, oranges, dates, grapes and seasonal fruits
home.cat2Desc: Tomatoes, carrots, potatoes and fresh vegetables
home.cat3Desc: Wheat, barley, corn and other local cereals
home.cat4Desc: Olive oil, table olives and related products
home.cat5Desc: Milk, cheese, yogurt and farm products
home.cat6Desc: Natural honey, spices and aromatic herbs
home.commitmentsSubtitle: What makes DZ-Fellah a trusted platform
home.value1Desc: Secure payments, producer verification, and personal data protection
home.value2Desc: Controlled freshness, full traceability, and compliance with standards
home.value3Desc: Support local farmers, promote local heritage, and boost the local economy
home.value4Desc: Transparent and fair pricing for everyone
home.contactSubtitle: Questions, suggestions, or partnerships? Our team is here to help.

about.title: About DZ-Fellah
about.subtitle: The platform connecting producers and consumers and transforming Algerian agriculture
about.missionP1: DZ-Fellah was born from a simple but ambitious vision: building a bridge between Algerian farmers and consumers. We believe every farmer deserves direct market access without traditional middlemen.
about.missionP2: Our platform gives producers the tools to sell directly, while ensuring consumers get the freshness and quality they want.
about.value1Desc: We build lasting relationships based on transparency and honesty
about.value3Desc: Fair prices that value producers' work
about.value4Desc: We use technology to simplify agricultural commerce
about.step1: Create your account as a producer or a client in minutes
about.step2: Browse fresh products or create your shop
about.step3: Buy or sell directly, without middlemen
about.step4: Receive fresh products directly at home
about.producersDesc: Sell your products directly to consumers
about.producerF1: Create your online shop for free
about.clientsDesc: Buy fresh products directly from the source
about.ctaText: Whether you're a producer looking to grow your customer base or a consumer looking for fresh local products, DZ-Fellah is for you.
